articles.title: Curiosity Mars rover gets 50 per cent speed boost from software update
articles.description: The navigation strategy of NASA's Curiosity rover means it has to stop frequently to check its position, but soon a software update will allow it to move almost continuously
articles.content:
By Matthew Sparkes
Artist’s impression of the Curiosity rover
NASA/JPL-Caltech
A new software update will soon give NASA’s Curiosity Mars rover a 50 per cent speed boost, allowing it to cover more… [+379 chars]

articles.title: JWST has captured a sparkling galaxy full of intense star formation
articles.description: The Great Barred Spiral Galaxy has some of the most extraordinary regions of star formation of any galaxy we’ve found, and the James Webb Space Telescope has snapped its picture
articles.content:
By Leah Crane
Star formation in this galaxy, NGC 1365, is driven by gas streaming to its centre
NASA / ESA / CSA / STScI. / R. Colombari
Researchers using the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST) hav… [+368 chars]

articles.title: Your smartphone could recognise you just by the way you hold it
articles.description: An artificially intelligent algorithm has learned to recognise people from the way their hands shake when they hold a smartphone
articles.content:
By Jeremy Hsu
The small movements you make when holding a phone may be enough for it to identify you

articles.title: Quantum computers might not offer extreme speed boost for chemistry
articles.description: One of the long-promised benefits of quantum computers is simulating molecules very quickly, but it turns out that these extra-fast speeds might not be possible
articles.content:

An artist’s impression of a quantum computer
Bartlomiej K. Wroblewski/Shutterstock

articles.title: Glowing Arctic snailfish is packed with antifreeze proteins
articles.description: Greenland’s variegated snailfish produces antifreeze proteins that stop large ice crystal formation, keeping the animal’s blood like a slushie, instead of frozen solid
articles.content:

A juvenile variegated snailfish

articles.title: Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Power Plant 'not designed to withstand fighting'

articles.title: NASA's InSight Mars lander found surprisingly little underground ice
articles.description: There is plenty of ice and watery minerals underground at the poles of Mars, but NASA’s InSight lander found almost none at the equator, leaving scientists wondering where the water went
articles.content:
By Leah Crane
The surface of Mars
NASA/ZUMA Press Wire
The Martian equator is surprisingly bereft of ice. Researchers used data from NASAs Mars InSight lander to search for underground ice and nat… [+410 chars]

articles.title: Europe’s extreme drought is exacerbating food and energy crises
articles.description: Rain forecast this week will not be enough to end Europe's drought, which could be the worst the continent has had in 500 years.

articles.title: Living robots made from human cells may induce neuron healing
